beers.description: Maitake Mushroom Mild. 4.7% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts and Maitake Mushrooms that were foraged locally by Jean. Solely and thoughtfully hopped with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast.
beers.summary: Maitake Mushroom Mild. 4.7% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts and Maitake Mushrooms that were foraged locally by Jean. Solely and thoughtfully hopped with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.description: Milkshake IPA. 7.2% One of our favorite killer riffs on our over-the-top Culinary IPA series. Brewed with a heavy amount of oats and lactose. Hopped AND dry hopped intensely with Mosaic and Citra and then conditioned atop almost twice the amount of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans.
beers.summary: Milkshake IPA. 7.2% One of our favorite killer riffs on our over-the-top Culinary IPA series. Brewed with a heavy amount of oats and lactose. Hopped AND dry hopped intensely with Mosaic and Citra and then conditioned atop almost twice the amount of luscious Madagascar vanilla beans.

beers.notes: Notes of chocolate covered raisins, cocoa, salted caramel, and cedar plank.
beers.description: Imperial Pretzel Stout. 9.0% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local sourdough pretzels, sea salt, and goopy blackstrap molasses.. Hopped with a handful of UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless then conditioned on Cacao nibs.10% of the proceeds of this beer will be donated to Philabundance.
beers.summary:
Imperial Pretzel Stout. 9.0% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local sourdough pretzels, sea salt, and goopy blackstrap molasses.. Hopped with a handful of UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless then conditioned on Cacao nibs.10% of the proceeds of this beer will be donated to Philabundance.
Notes of chocolate covered raisins, cocoa, salted caramel, and cedar plank.

beers.notes: Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.
beers.description: Hay and Spicebush Saison. 5.1% Brewed with oats, foraged spicebush from Jeans farm and alfalfa hay. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Hay and Spicebush Saison. 5.1% Brewed with oats, foraged spicebush from Jeans farm and alfalfa hay. Gently hopped in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented in stainless with our magickal saison yeast.
Notes of bursting kiwi, guava smoothie, strawberry, and dried apricot.

beers.notes: Notes of juicy white peach, sticky cantaloupe, ripe star fruit, and damp forest.
beers.description: Single Hop IPA. 6.66% Brewed with fluffy oats and hopped solely in the kettle with a new one to us, Strata. Then dry hopped on an embarrassing amount of even more Strata hops.
beers.summary:
Single Hop IPA. 6.66% Brewed with fluffy oats and hopped solely in the kettle with a new one to us, Strata. Then dry hopped on an embarrassing amount of even more Strata hops.
Notes of juicy white peach, sticky cantaloupe, ripe star fruit, and damp forest.

beers.notes: otes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.
beers.description: Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
beers.summary:
Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
otes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.

beers.notes: otes of late harvest riesling, mango smoothie, orange CBD gummies, and rainbow sorbet.
beers.description: Pineapple Triple IPA. 10% Brewed with red wheat. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Nelson Sauvin. Aggressively dry hopped with even more Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo then conditioned on heaps of goopy pineapple puree.
beers.summary:
Pineapple Triple IPA. 10% Brewed with red wheat. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Nelson Sauvin. Aggressively dry hopped with even more Nelson Sauvin and Amarillo then conditioned on heaps of goopy pineapple puree.
otes of late harvest riesling, mango smoothie, orange CBD gummies, and rainbow sorbet.
